name: Click Sounds
description: Plays a sound when you press a jump button.

master-section.name: Master
master-section.description: This category controls both click and release sounds.

enable-master.name: Master Enable
enable-master.description: If disabled, no click or release sounds will play.

master-volume.name: Master Volume (%)
master-volume.description: Controls the overall volume of both click and release sounds.

clicksounds-section.name: Click Sounds
clicksounds-section.description: This category is for settings that are for <cr>Click Sounds</c>

release-section.name: Release Sounds
release-section.description: This category is for settings that are for <cr>Release Sounds</c>

Miscellaneous-section.name: Miscellaneous
Miscellaneous-section.description: This category is for settings that are <cr>Miscellaneous</c> and are extra features

sounds-everywhere.name: Sounds Everywhere (buggy)
sounds-everywhere.description: Sounds will play everywhere instead of just in levels. This will break all botting tools. (Experimental)

only-on-jump.name: Only play on jump
only-on-jump.description: Doesn't play sound on movement of platformer keys. Ignored by the 'Sounds Everywhere' option.

settings-button.name: Show settings button
settings-button.description: When enabled, a settings button appears in the pause menu.

sfx-semitone.name: Pitch of the sounds
sfx-semitone.description: Determines the pitch of click/release sounds using semitones. The Default semitones is set 0 (12 semitones = 1 Octave)

advanced-section.name: Advanced Options
advanced-section.description: Only touch these if you know what you're doing.

downloadOnStartup.name: Download index on startup
downloadOnStartup.description: When enabled, the Click Sounds Index will automatically download on startup. This is very data heavy and not recommended for those on cellular data.
